cab.content: TttIS D00UM3HT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1S COTCTOJSKT.S 3 C 3 EWAR CABBJET.ACKNOV^EDGMENT. BY IQRB NORTHCLIFFE OFAPPRECIATION OF HIS SERVICES IN AMERICA.Copy of telegram No.475 fromJL ord Northell fie ,, Despatched New York 2" 11.7.17". Received 4.11.17.Following is from UORD NORTHCLIFFS to C. J. PHILLIPS for :AR" CABINETAllow me to express my gratitude for kind message No. 171. Credit is entirely due to the men you sent out, supported "by British volunteers resident, most of them highly successful men of business. Numbering in all some 500, thoy are working night and day because thoy realise that the war can only be won from here, and that only if the giant resources of this republic be wisely utilised.
